words.defineEn: a severe form of leptospirosis in human beings
words.defineVi: một dạng bệnh leptospirosis nghiêm trọng ở người

words.defineEn: an infectious tropical disease resembling syphilis in its early stages; marked by red skin eruptions and ulcerating lesions
words.defineVi: một bệnh nhiệt đới truyền nhiễm giống như bệnh giang mai ở giai đoạn đầu; được đánh dấu bằng phát ban da đỏ và tổn thương loét

examples: Well, under King's command, the facility mistakenly shipped live anthrax to other labs.
Plague, Ebola, anthrax, tuberculosis and HIV are all endemic here.
These stomachs of steel are essential to removing pathogens like cholera, anthrax, and rabies from the African ecosystem.
Another notorious site was the Hart Senate office building in Washington D.C. which closed down when 30 employees were infected with anthrax bacteria.
Then they become active, infectious anthrax bacteria causing severe lesions, flu-like symptoms, and even potentially death.
words.defineEn: a serious bacterial disease of warm-blooded animals, particularly cattle and sheep, that can be transmitted to people by contaminated wool, raw meat, or other animal products
words.defineVi: một bệnh vi khuẩn nghiêm trọng của động vật máu nóng, đặc biệt là gia súc và cừu, có thể truyền sang người do len, thịt sống hoặc các sản phẩm động vật khác bị ô nhiễm

examples: Some estimates even say over a third of all humans have toxoplasmosis without knowing it.
There is a concern with pregnant women caring for cats in terms of the litter box, and really the risk is toxoplasmosis.
It is actually fairly rare in the US for women to come into contact with toxoplasmosis.
But even with all this research, other studies have suggested there isn’t a significant association between toxoplasmosis and mental disorders.
And if that parasite gets into a human, it can result in a full-blown infection called toxoplasmosis, which could be bad news for your body and your mind.
words.defineEn: a parasitic disease that mainly affects unborn children and is mostly transmitted through undercooked meat, soil, or cat feces
words.defineVi: một bệnh ký sinh chủ yếu ảnh hưởng đến thai nhi và chủ yếu lây truyền qua thịt, đất hoặc phân mèo chưa nấu chín

examples: All right, so the species we're talkin' about is the Aedes aegypti, they're the ones that carry Zika, Chikagunya, and Dengue Fever.
While in the US, we don't have to worry about Malaria anymore, mosquitoes can still spread West Nile, Dengue Fever, Chikagunya, and most recently, Zika.
words.defineEn: an infectious disease of the tropics transmitted by mosquitoes and characterized by rash and aching head and joints
words.defineVi: một bệnh truyền nhiễm của vùng nhiệt đới do muỗi truyền và đặc trưng bởi phát ban và đau đầu và khớp

words.defineEn: caused by rickettsial bacteria and transmitted by wood ticks
words.defineVi: do vi khuẩn rickettsia gây ra và lây truyền qua ve gỗ

words.defineEn: the flavivirus that causes West Nile encephalitis
words.defineVi: flavivirus gây viêm não West Nile
